bomb - package bomb
 
Bomb - Class in bomb
Description:

Dislayment of bomb at appropriate time and location on map grid
Bomb is designed to appear when it is dropped by character at user's command
Bomb is placed at exact coordinates of the character
Bomb should disappear when detonated
Bomb(int, int, Game, int, int, int) - Constructor for class bomb.Bomb
Responsible for acquiring bomb image from sprite sheet and detonating at specified time
Includes effects such as damage to enemies and player character

Inputs:
x, y - coordinates for where bomb should be placed
game - Game object
bombStrength - the amount of health the character loses from the bomb
bombLength - the size of the bomb
duration - the time that the bomb is present before detonation
bomb - Static variable in class data.SpriteData
 
bombArray - Variable in class gameObject.Controller

bombLength - Variable in class gameObject.MovableObject

Brick - Class in bricks
Description:

Displays brick image as an obstacle in game map
Brick(int, int, Game) - Constructor for class bricks.Brick
Displays brick image at specific coordinates in game map
Acquires brick image and fits the image at specific size based on grid map conditions Inputs: x,y - coordinates of brick image game - Game object
brickList - Variable in class gameObject.Controller
 
bricks - package bricks
 
bricks - Static variable in class data.SpriteData
